name: Blueberry Muffin 2: The Return of Muffin
name_original: Blueberry Muffin 2: The Return of Muffin
description:
The long and very awaited sequel to the greatest franchise of all time, Blueberry Muffin 2: The Return of Muffin! You've had your muffin taken from you again and now you must get it back!

4/10 IGN. "Well, at least you can fight stuff"

I am currently eating a muffin while making this description
